ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/8/99 8:08:52 PM Eastern Standard Time, kayntwhyle@uswest.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/8/99 8:08:52 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kayntwhyle@... writes:

<<
This doesn't work much anymore... Bat Wings are purchasable in unlimited
amounts in Kithicor and West Freeport (probably other zones as well, Ogguk
or Grobb almost ceratinly) for about 14 copper each. People are beginning to
know this. :)
>>

I do know this :)
But...,
Higher lvl wizards and even many mid lvl wizards like me will jump on an
offer to buy 20 wings or so for 10pp (chump change really) - just so as not
to even bother with trying to find a merchant that has them - or go to a zone
where we have no business to attend to.

Wizaro Wrathcaster
